# HandleChangeStreamIsActive

**Instance Method**

Tells the stream the activity state is changing.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t HandleChangeStreamIsActive(bool in_is_active);
```

## Parameters

- **in_is_active**: `true` if the stream is to become active; otherwise, `false`.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

The default implementation calls [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream/SetStreamIsActive] and returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess]. Subclass and override this method to handle changes to the stream format and return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] upon success.

## Managing Stream Changes

- **HandleChangeCurrentStreamFormat**: Tells the stream the format is changing.
- **DeviceSampleRateChanged**: Updates stream formats, in response to the owning audio device changing its sample rate.
